<<<<<<< HEAD
Contemplations vpon the historie of the old Testament. The seuenth volume. In two bookes. By Ios. Hall D.D. Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 7 Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
[10], 516, [2] p.
Printed by I. Haviland for Nath. Butter, London : 1623.
Books 18-19. The last leaf is blank. The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holy storie. A variant of the edition with H. Fetherstone's name in the imprint. Identified as STC 12658a on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

Printed by I. Haviland for Nath. Butter, London : 1623.
Books 18-19. The last leaf is blank. The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holy storie. A variant of the edition with H. Fetherstone's name in the imprint. Identified as STC 12658a on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
